item.title: [sta] Approach of the Second Sun
item.description:
Sorcery

If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named Approach of the Second Sun this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put Approach of the Second Sun into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.

item.title: [sta] Approach of the Second Sun
item.description:
Sorcery

If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named Approach of the Second Sun this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put Approach of the Second Sun into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.

item.title: [sta] Agonizing Remorse
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.

item.title: [sta] Agonizing Remorse
item.description:

item.title: [sta] Adventurous Impulse
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [sta] Adventurous Impulse
item.description:

Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [sta] Abundant Harvest
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [sta] Abundant Harvest
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [pc21] Temple of Malady
item.description:
Land

Temple of Malady enters the battlefield tapped.

When Temple of Malady enters the battlefield, scry 1.

{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

item.title: [slu] Blast Zone
item.description:
Land

Blast Zone enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it.

{T}: Add {C}.

{X}{X}, {T}: Put X charge counters on Blast Zone.

{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Blast Zone: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Blast Zone.

item.description:

item.description:

item.description:
Land
